credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Stepau, 1981 - Teatre Nowy
description: Black and white image of a film negative across entire poster, showing men carrying signs. In bottom left, a splatter of red with white text on top. In top right, text reads: "TEATR NOWY" in white and "w Poznaniu" in black. Text across bottom reads "Oskarzony:/ CZERWIEC PIECDZIESIATSZESC" in white.
name: Poster
